scripts.dev: sed -i 's/https://cococloud.co/zanzibar/http://localhost:5984/zanzibar/' app/start.coffee;npm run watch & npm run livereload & npm run static
scripts.deploy: sed -i 's/http:\/\/localhost:5984\/zanzibar/https:\/\/cococloud.co\/zanzibar/' app/start.coffee;browserify -v -t coffeeify --debug --extension='.coffee' app/start.coffee -o bundle.js;couchapp push cloud
